MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL74 postcode area of Tyn-Y-Gongl affecting properties in Benllech and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:56am. Our engineers on site are making progress on the underground cable repairs and we still expect your power to be restored by 12noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.05am on 6th of March 2021.
